video_prompt: A human figure walks towards the base of a colossal, glitching, dark head. The head's single eye pulsates with light, and digital "drips" fall from its face. Vibrant, static-like horizontal lines and color separation effects continuously tear and shift across the entire scene.
image_prompt: Dark glitch-art style head sculpture with a single glowing eye and dripping textures, dominating the upper frame. A small figure walks towards its base in the lower frame. Heavily stylized with vibrant horizontal glitch lines, color separation effects, and a stark white background. Emphasizes decay, monumentality, and digital disruption.
refined_video_prompt: A figure moves towards a glitching head. Its single eye pulsates with light as digital drips continually fall from its face. Throughout the entire scene, vibrant, static-like horizontal lines and color separation effects relentlessly tear and shift, dynamically altering the environment.
